item.description:
Lets all go out and celebrate Halloween, get out your costumes and have a fun some fun, (they are optional:),,Dancing to great tunes of our Castleton DJ, past years have been a blast, I heard last year a group went out for breakfast afterwards, lets get the word out early.

P.S.: while at the last Castleton dance they asked for feed back wanting to know if any one is in favor of a New Years Party, if so contact them at togethernh@msn.com

We can all wear what we want on this night,,yahoo no dress code!!!

Admission 10.00 before 9pm and 12.00 after that, get there early parking will be tough this night.

Directions: Exit 3 off 93-turn left onto 111- down on left 1/4 mile.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Ghost, Gobblins and Fun Annual Halloween Party!!!
